world.cyber crimes: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.score from c_crime cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id;
world.serveurs: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.servsperhab from servers cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.Alphabetisation 15: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.literacy_15 from literacy_rate cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.Alphabetisation 25-64: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.literacy_25_64 from literacy_rate cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.Alphabetisation 64 et plus: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.literacy_65 from literacy_rate cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.homicides: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.rate from homicides cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.migration: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.value from migration cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.Score regime politique: select c.nicename , c.iso ,  cc.score_regime from type_political_regime cc , countries c where cc.country_id = c.id and year =
world.nombre d'importation en materiel techno: select countries.nicename  ,iso , percent  from  ict_imports , countries  where   country_id = countries.id   and year =
world.nombre d'exportation en materiel techno: select countries.nicename  , iso, percent   from ict_exports  , countries  where   country_id = countries.id and year =
world.utilisateurs internet: select countries.nicename  , iso , usagescore  from netusers  , countries  where   country_id = countries.id  and year =
world.population par pays: select countries.nicename  , iso , population  from population  , countries  where   country_id = countries.id  and year =
world.score de piratage: select countries.nicename  , iso , value from bsa  , countries  where   country_id = countries.id  and year =
world.donnees militaire: select countries.nicename  ,  iso , score from  gmi  , countries  where   country_id = countries.id and year =
world.produit interieure brut par habitant: select countries.nicename  , iso  , pibphab  from  piba , countries  where   country_id = countries.id  and year =
